strapiPost.title: Nothing Goes Together Like Pickleball and PB&JJ
strapiPost.content:
The uptown entertainment venue, JJ's Live, is getting a fun, new addition - a pickleball court and food truck via PB&JJ.

  • Fun and food: JJ's Live is a 2,500 person live music and entertainment venue with an already jam packed lineup for the 2022 concert season.
  • PB and pickleball: The latest addition to the venue is the PB&JJ food truck with peanut butter themed menu items and a legit pickleball court.

There will be a "Dink and Drink" tournament March 5 - 6 for the venue's opening weekend, and you will be able to reserve the court online beginning March 1.
